title: Lesson 50
paragraph: Transport and freight management ensures goods move efficiently. Elevating, preparing, and donating resources responsibly helps maintain reliable logistics.

words.meaning: to lift or raise to a higher level
words.example: The platform elevates workers to the desired height.
The freight was delayed due to weather.

words.meaning: capable of being given as a gift

words.example: He is always considerate of others' feelings.

words.meaning: to have the means to do or buy
words.example: We cannot afford any delays in the project.
There is a slight chance of rain.

words.meaning: to make ready for use or action
words.example: She prepared the documents for the meeting.
The initial phase of the project is complete.

words.meaning: to refuse to notice or acknowledge
words.example: He chose to ignore the warning signs.
